meanings.sent1: She is the jiggiest dancer in the group.
meanings.sent2: The music at the party was the jiggiest I've ever heard.
meanings.sent3: His outfit was the jiggiest thing at the event.
meanings.sent4: The jiggiest car on the street zoomed past us.
meanings.sent5: The jiggiest beat got everyone on their feet.

meanings.sent1: The puppy was the jiggiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The children were the jiggiest players on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The jiggiest squirrel in the park kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the jiggiest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The jiggiest song made everyone want to dance.

meanings.definition: Having the most rhythm or groove.
meanings.sent1: The drummer was the jiggiest member of the band.
meanings.sent2: The jiggiest music filled the dance floor.
meanings.sent3: The jiggiest cat in the neighborhood loved to move to the music.
meanings.sent4: His dance moves were the jiggiest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The jiggiest melody stayed in my head all day.
